类的使用
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit.webdriver.MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder

  • 使用MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit.webdriver
    Server-side support for testing Spring MVC applications with MockMvc and the Selenium HtmlUnitDriver.

    • org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit.webdriver中MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder的使用

      返回MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder的org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit.webdriver中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder.javascriptEnabled(boolean javascriptEnabled)
      Specify whether JavaScript should be enabled.
      static MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder.mockMvcSetup(MockMvc mockMvc)
      Create a new MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder based on the supplied MockMvc instance.
      static MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder.webAppContextSetup(WebApplicationContext context)
      Create a new MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder based on the supplied WebApplicationContext.
      static MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder.webAppContextSetup(WebApplicationContext context, MockMvcConfigurer configurer)
      Create a new MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder based on the supplied WebApplicationContext and MockMvcConfigurer.
      MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder MockMvcHtmlUnitDriverBuilder.withDelegate(WebConnectionHtmlUnitDriver driver)
      Supply the WebConnectionHtmlUnitDriver that the driver built by this builder should delegate to when processing non-matching requests.
